sn22.5:1.7: Rupassa samudayanca atthangamanca, vedanaya samudayanca atthangamanca, sannaya samudayanca atthangamanca, sankharanam samudayanca atthangamanca, vinnanassa samudayanca atthangamanca.
sn22.5:2.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, rupassa samudayo, ko vedanaya samudayo, ko sannaya samudayo, ko sankharanam samudayo, ko vinnanassa samudayo?
sn22.5:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn22.5:3.3: Tassa rupam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato uppajjati nandi.
sn22.5:4.5: Tassa vinnanam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato uppajjati nandi.
sn22.5:6.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, rupassa atthangamo, ko vedanaya …
sn22.5:7.1: Idha, bhikkhave, nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati.
sn22.5:8.3: Tassa rupam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato ya rupe nandi sa nirujjhati.
sn22.5:9.2: Tassa vedanam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato ya vedanaya nandi sa nirujjhati.
sn22.5:10.3: Tassa sankhare anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato ya sankharesu nandi sa nirujjhati.
sn22.5:11.2: Tassa vinnanam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato ya vinnane nandi sa nirujjhati.
sn22.5:12.1: Ayam, bhikkhave, rupassa atthangamo, ayam vedanaya atthangamo, ayam sannaya atthangamo, ayam sankharanam atthangamo, ayam vinnanassa atthangamo”ti.
